code: import{React,useRef,useEffect}from'react';import'./HeroStyle.css';import cloud1 from"../img/cloud1.svg";import cloud2 from"../img/cloud2.svg";import moon from"../img/moon.svg";import{gsap}from"gsap";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Hero=function Hero(){var heroText=useRef();var moonSVG=useRef();useEffect(function(){gsap.from(heroText.current,{scrollTrigger:{toggleActions:'play none restart restart',trigger:'.hero-text'},opacity:0,delay:1.1,z:100,duration:2,stagger:0.5});});useEffect(function(){gsap.to(moonSVG.current,{scrollTrigger:{toggleActions:'play none restart restart',trigger:'.moon'},delay:3,rotation:360,duration:3});});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"top",className:"hero",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero-text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{title:"Luna Cuevas",className:"intro",children:"Luna Cuevas"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero-p",ref:heroText,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Developer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"&"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Designer"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"moon",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"cloud1",src:cloud1,alt:"left cloud svg"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"moon1",src:moon,alt:"moon svg"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"cloud2",src:cloud2,alt:"right cloud svg"})]})]})});};export default Hero;
